comment: Measurability of a piecewise function: if ` F ` is measurable on subsets ` B ` and ` C ` of its domain, and these pieces make up all of ` A ` , then ` F ` is measurable on the whole domain. Similar to ~ mbfres2 but here the theorem is extended to complex-valued functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
